pronunciation.pinyin: gǔ jīn yùn huì jǔ yào
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: Gu3 jin1 Yun4 hui4 Ju3 yao4

meanings.value: "Summary of the Collection of Rhymes Old and New", supplemented and annotated Yuan dynasty version of the no-longer-extant late Song or early Yuan "Collection of Rhymes Old and New" 古今韻會|古今韵会
